Update auctions to use LSG strategies, add swap improvements and UI updates

- Add UniswapV2 fallback for DONUT swaps when Kyber has no route
- Update governance contract addresses \(GovernanceToken, Voter, Multicall\)
- Fix TypeScript errors in useMineRig and useRigState hooks
- Add new UI components \(Dialog, Input, Separator\)
- Various styling and layout improvements
